title: Greg Norman Designs The Bluffs in Vietnam
headline: Greg Norman Designs The Bluffs in Vietnam
description: Greg Norman's latest design is The Bluffs, a links-style course on Vietnam's Ho Tram Strip, about 2-1/2 hours southeast of Ho Chi Minh City.
